import axios from 'axios' import Link from 'next/link' import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' import { useCookies } from 'react-cookie' import NavbarProfile from '../components/navbarProfile.component' import handlerUpdateProfileImg from './updateProfileImg.component' const UserProfile = () => { const [cookie, setCookie] = useCookies(['user']), [user, setUser] = useState({}), imgProfileRef = useRef(null) const handlerGetUser = async () => { const userData = await (await axios.get(`${process.env.API_PATH}/v1/user/${cookie.user.id}`)).data setUser(userData) }, updateImgProfile = async e => { let frmData = new FormData(); frmData.append('img', imgProfileRef.current.files[0]); console.log(await handlerUpdateProfileImg(frmData, cookie.user.id)) } useEffect(() => { handlerGetUser() }, []) return( <>

{user?.fullname} @{user?.username} token: {user?.public_token} Cuenta { cookie?.user?.auth?.user_verify ? 'verificada' : 'no verificada' } { !cookie?.user?.auth?.user_verify && ( Verificar ) }

) } export default UserProfile
